name: MagicStorm
body:
### MagicStorm:Minecraft Pocket Edition server software written in PHP.
  MagicStorm Feature
  - Easy to learn API
  - Very good Mob AI(Like on a Survival Word) 
  - Very Good World-Generator(Like on a Survival Word) 
  - Plugins
  - Forums(Soon) 
  - Commits evry day
  - We are not talking code from any software. 
  
### Ways to contact us:
  - Gitter: https://gitter.im/MagicRain/Lobby) 

### Test servers(Soon) (With a loot of minigames). 

### Authors and Contributors
    - Authors and people who are contributing on FB:
    - @BlockBoy
### Forks and Pull Request.
    - Pull Request will be manualy reviewed by our staff. If you will get a bad response, you can ask to give you a good reason. 
    - Because MsgicStorm is licenced under GPL3 you can make forks, but if you really want to suport FireBlaze please make a pull request with your awesome changes:) 

### What are you waiting? 
  Try MagicStorm now!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
